name: Duoc Nguyen
tagline: Pi-shaped engineer: Backend/AI tooling × AI agents/MCP × Product iteration
bio: Engineering Manager at FireGroup, building e-commerce systems at scale.

Outside work, I build tools that scratch my own itch. Started with Obsidian plugins (obsidian-open-gate, 223⭐), then dove into MCP servers to make AI assistants more useful (jira-mcp, google-mcp). Most projects begin as weekend experiments.
I write at 12bit.vn about technical decisions and onepercent.plus about continuous improvement. Founded Vue.js Vietnam community in 2016 when the framework was still new.
Side project aiocean.io is where I prototype AI tooling ideas - currently focused on Claude plugins and desktop app distribution (Clik).
After 13 years, still learning Go and TypeScript daily. The best code is the one you delete.
Based in Vietnam, working with distributed teams globally.
now: Building Claude MCP plugins and tooling at aiocean/claude-plugins
Contributing to CodeWiki with Python multi-language analyzer improvements
Experimenting with investment tracking tools and data visualization
